item.title: Solving Backspace Problem in SSH Client
item.description: When using SSH you may run into the ‘backspace problem’, effectively not being able to erase characters. Until recent, I could solve this problem by setting the terminal environment-variable. This however did not work the last time, and I had to find another solution. This blog describes how I solved it. First step is to get the termaps. In my case, these were not available and I had to install them first.
